data.title: fix(hesai): set PTP config only when changed
chore: revert "docs: fix broken contributing link in README.md (#399)"

fix: update calibration file paths in Hesai and Velodyne launch and schema files to reference the correct decoder packages

feat(docs): migrate current documentation from Mkdocs to Zensical
test(hesai): regenerate out-of-date ground truhts for AT128 and XT16

prevent node crash on LiDAR timeout

fix: address lock consistency violation report by FB Infer
build: remove autoware_msgs from repos file
ci(infer): fix fb-infer-report for prs on forks
feat(hesai): allow for calibration file override

fix(continental_ars548): driver and config race condition
